Thinking about joining our program? Find out what you can expect as a student at UIC.       Year 1    Year 1    Year 2         Fall    Spring    Summer       Everyone begins the semester with three days of orientation the week before classes begin with a day of introductions, tours, administrative, and informational sessions. During orientation, our new students attend a full day workshop presented by Vitruvian Studio , where they work with artists Melinda Whitmore and David Jamison to create a scale écorché figure before beginning the gross anatomy course. Courses in illustration, design, modeling and animation provide you with a solid foundation in visual problem solving and critical thinking. You’ll complete rotations through various medical specialty departments, looking over shoulders of celebrated UIC physicians and surgeons.
